item.title: Windows, Mac And Linux Users Given New LinkedIn Security Warning
item.description: A security warning has been issued for LinkedIn users as North Korean Lazarus hackers launch a new threat campaign.

item.title: Samsung Is Emailing Galaxy S25 Buyers A New Discount Code
item.description: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 with a new discount promo code.

item.description: Kelly Stafford, wife of NFL quarterback Matthew Stafford and mother of four young children opened up about the need for good sleep, fighting the flu, ...

item.title: ChatGPT Search Is Now Free To Use Without An Account—Is It Safe?
item.description: Open AI’s ChatGPT search is now available to everyone, for free, even without an account. But is it safe, even when you are not signed in?

item.title: Google Chrome Drive-By Hack Attack Confirmed—Act Now To Stay Safe
item.description: As hackers target Google Chrome app downloads, here’s what you need to know.
